function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Measurement results not within the compliance range","Impact":"Inaccurate rating of IEQ parameters","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and maintenance of sensors, and validation of measurement data","Technologies":"Sensor calibration tools, data validation software","People":"Occupants, building managers","Owner":"Building management team"},{"Description":"Weighting scheme not reflective of occupants' priorities","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of overall IEQ index","Mitigation":"Regular surveys and feedback collection from building occupants to update weighting scheme","Technologies":"Survey tools, feedback collection platforms","People":"Building occupants, research team","Owner":"Research team"}]}
